tasks.label: Format Current Python File
args: file='${file}' && if [[ "$file" == *.py ]] && [[ -f "$file" ]]; then echo "üßπ Running autoflake on $file..." && uv run --group dev autoflake --remove-all-unused-imports --remove-unused-variables --ignore-init-module-imports --in-place "$file" && echo "üì¶ Running isort on $file..." && uv run --group dev isort --profile=black "$file" && echo "‚¨ÜÔ∏è  Running pyupgrade on $file..." && uv run --group dev pyupgrade --py312-plus "$file" && echo "‚ö´ Running black on $file..." && uv run --group dev black "$file" && echo "‚úÖ Formatted $file"; else echo "‚ùå Not a Python file or file does not exist: $file"; fi
